text: (hazrat ibrahim alh-e-salam ney) kaha kay tum ney jin buton ki parastish Allah kay siwa ki hai unhen tum ney apni aapas ki duniyawi dosti ki bina thera li hai tum sab qayamat kay din aik doosray say kufur kerney lago gay aur aik doosray per lanat kerney lago gay. Aur tumhara sab ka thikana dozakh hoga aur tumhara koi madadgaar na hoga
